I.name: Z-Drive Resonance
description: {{sbc|Innate - Resonance:}} '''Ekko's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}} and damaging [[Champion ability|abilities]] apply a ''Resonance'' [[stack]] to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks and damaging abilities.

At 3 stacks, ''Resonance'' is consumed to deal {{pp|30 to 80 by 10; 80 to 140|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}. ''Z-Drive Resonance'' deals 300% damage against {{tip|monsters}}.
''Resonance'' cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.

{{sbc|Innate - Stolen Time:}} Triggering ''Resonance'' against a {{tip|champion}} grants '''Ekko''' {{pp|key=%|50 to 80 for 4|1 to 16|color=movement speed}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{pp|2 to 3 for 3|1 to 11}} seconds.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Resonance: Ekko's basic attacks on-hit and damaging Champion ability apply a Resonance stack to affected enemies for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks and damaging abilities.
At 3 stacks, Resonance is consumed to deal 30 − 80 by 10; 80 (based on level) (+ 80% AP) bonus magic damage. Z-Drive Resonance deals 300% damage against monsters.
Resonance cannot affect the same target more than once every few seconds.
Innate - Stolen Time: Triggering Resonance against a champion grants Ekko 1 to 16 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed for 1 to 11 ‒ undefined seconds.
I.notes:
* '''Ekko's''' basic attacks have different animations based on how many stacks his target has. His attack pattern is as follows: 
** {{tt|Downwards|first stack}} → {{tt|Upwards|second stack}} → {{tt|Sideways|third stack to consume all stacks}}
*** If the target has already been affected by ''Resonance'', '''Ekko's''' basic attack animations will kick or attack the target sideways.
* ''Resonance'' stacks will not be applied nor consumed if the basic attack is {{tip|dodged}} or {{tip|blocked}} or if the attack {{tip|blind|misses}}.

Q.name: Timewinder
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' throws a temporal grenade in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit.

At 700 units or upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}}, the grenade slows down for {{fd|1.75}} seconds to gradually expand into a ''Temporal Sickness'' field that {{tip|slows}} nearby enemies, travelling for another 190 units.
Afterwards, the grenade contracts and homes back to '''Ekko''' at a higher speed, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ekko throws a temporal grenade in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit.
At 700 units or upon hitting an enemy champion, the grenade slows down for 1.75 seconds to gradually expand into a Temporal Sickness field that slows nearby enemies, travelling for another 190 units.
Afterwards, the grenade contracts and homes back to Ekko at a higher speed, dealing magic damage to enemies hit. Enemies can be hit only once per pass.
leveling: {{st|Returning Magic Damage|{{ap|40 to 140}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|60+40 to 120+140}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
Q.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only a single instance of damage.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str: • Outward Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP)

• Returning Magic Damage: (+ 60% AP)
  • Total Damage: (+ 90% AP)

W.name: Parallel Convergence
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Ekko's''' basic attacks deal {{as|3% {{as|(+ 3% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''missing''' health|health}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to targets below {{sti|health|{{as|30% of their '''maximum''' health}}}}. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' calls upon an afterimage that bats a device to the target location, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for {{fd|2.5}} seconds after 2 seconds. After 3 seconds, the device will expand for 1.5 seconds, {{tip|slowing}} enemies within the area by 40%.
If '''Ekko''' enters the expansion after it lands, it detonates to {{tip|shield}} him for 2 seconds and {{tip|stun}} all enemies within the area for {{fd|2.25}} seconds.
Enemies can see the indicator for ''Parallel Convergence'' after 2 seconds.
W.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal 3% (+ 3% per 100 AP) of the target's missing health bonus magic damage to targets below 30% of their maximum health. The damage has a minimum threshold of 15 and is capped at 150 against minions and monsters.
Active: Ekko calls upon an afterimage that bats a device to the target location, granting sight of the area for 2.5 seconds after 2 seconds. After 3 seconds, the device will expand for 1.5 seconds, slowing enemies within the area by 40%.
If Ekko enters the expansion after it lands, it detonates to shield him for 2 seconds and stun all enemies within the area for 2.25 seconds.
Enemies can see the indicator for Parallel Convergence after 2 seconds.
W.notes:
* Applies {{tip|proc damage}} for the passive.
* '''Ekko''' can detonate the expansion even while {{tip|untargetable}} (i.e. {{ais|Chronobreak|Ekko}} dash), but not if he is {{tip|resurrection|resurrecting}}.
* ''Parallel Convergence'' will continue to {{tip|slow}} enemies even if its expansion is detonated.

E.name: Phase Dive
E.target_range: {{tt|325|Dash distance}} / {{tt|550|Maximum increased dash distance across terrain}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' {{tip|dashes}} in the target direction, then causes his next [[basic attack]] within 3 seconds to gain {{sti|range|300 '''bonus''' range}}, have a {{fd|0.25}}-second cast time, make him {{tip|blink}} within {{tt|125|Estimated}} range of the target, and deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}.
''Phase Dive'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Ekko's''' basic attack timer.
'''Ekko''' can cast any of his [[champion ability|abilities]] during the dash.
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ekko dashes in the target direction, then causes his next basic attack within 3 seconds to gain 300 bonus range, have a 0.25-second cast time, make him blink within 125 range of the target, and deal bonus magic damage.
Phase Dive resets Ekko's basic attack timer.
Ekko can cast any of his champion ability during the dash.
E.notes:
* The {{tip|dash}} distance can be extended to up-to 550 units when targeting across terrain. It will only extend for the distance needed to cross the wall.
* While {{tip|ground|grounded}} or {{tip|root|rooted}}, '''Ekko''' loses the {{sti|'''bonus''' attack range}} from ''Phase Dive''.
* ''Phase Drive's'' attack can be {{tip|blocked}} or {{tip|dodged}}, consuming the basic attack without dealing any damage. If the attack {{tip|blind|misses}}, the same will happen.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, {{tip|death|dies}}, or is too far away during the empowered attack's cast time, it is cancelled but not consumed.

effects.str: • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 40% AP)

R.name: Chronobreak
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Upon learning ''Chronobreak'' or if its '''current''' cooldown is lower than 4 seconds, '''Ekko''' reveals a time-delayed ''afterimage'' of himself that tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ekko''' enters {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} at the start of the cast time, and afterwards {{tip|heal|heals}} himself and {{tip|dash|dashes}} to his ''afterimage's'' current location over {{fd|0.5}} seconds. Upon arrival, the stasis ends and he generates an explosion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies.
'''''Ekko''' is immune to all {{tip|airborne|displacements}} during Chronobreak''.
R.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Upon learning Chronobreak or if its current cooldown is lower than 4 seconds, Ekko reveals a time-delayed afterimage of himself that tracks where he was 4 seconds ago.
Active: Ekko enters stasis at the start of the cast time, and afterwards heals himself and dashes to his afterimage's current location over 0.5 seconds. Upon arrival, the stasis ends and he generates an explosion, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies.
Ekko is immune to all displacements during Chronobreak.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|150 to 450}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}{{st|Heal|{{ap|100 to 200}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} (+ 3% ''per {{as|1% of health}} lost in the past 4 seconds'')}}
R.notes:
* '''Ekko''' will attempt to basic attack the closest target after appearing at the cast location, but can do so quicker if he manually attack commands after the dash, except if {{ai|Phase Dive|Ekko}} is primed.
* The ''afterimage's'' location will explode even if '''Ekko's''' {{tip|dash}} is interrupted.
* The ''afterimage'' is always visible to '''Ekko''' and his allies. To enemies, the ''afterimage'' can only be seen if they {{tip|sight}} of it.
* A ''link'' can also be seen between the ''afterimage'' and '''Ekko''' that traces along his path.
** The ''link'' follows the same visibility rules as the ''afterimage''.
** Upon activation, '''Ekko''' travels full distance through the ''link'', and thus will detonate {{ai|Parallel Convergence|Ekko}} that the ''link'' passes through.
* [[File: Quicksilver Sash item.png|20px|link=]] {{nie|Quicksilver}} is placed on a 1-second {{sti|cooldown}} upon casting ''Chronobreak''.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 150% AP)
  • Heal: (+ 60% AP) (+ 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds)

st_slices: (+ 60% AP) (+ 3% per 1% of health lost in the past 4 seconds)
